wikipedia_page.main: Timothy Ian Eglinton  is a professor of biogeoscience at the Geological Institute, ETH Zürich.

response: Eglinton married Pamela Joan Coupland, and had two sons, and one daughter. His son Timothy Eglinton is a Professor of Biogeoscience at the Geological Institute, ETH Zürich.
